android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground

manifest_analysis.title:
App has a Network Security Configuration
[android:networkSecurityConfig]
manifest_analysis.desc: The Network Security Configuration feature lets apps customize their network security settings in a safe, declarative configuration file without modifying app code. These settings can be configured for specific domains and for a specific app.
manifest_analysis.name: App has a Network Security Configuration [android:networkSecurityConfig]

manifest_analysis.title: Launch Mode of Activity (com.playrix.fishdomdd.gplay.StoreActivity) is not standard.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent. So it is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.
manifest_analysis.name: Launch Mode of Activity is not standard.

manifest_analysis.desc: A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. playstore_details.title: Fishdom
playstore_details.description:
Never Fishdomed before? Take a deep breath and dive into an underwater world of match-3 fun with Fishdom, an all-new free game!
 
Try challenging and fun match-3 gameplay with unique puzzles as you decorate aquariums to create cozy homes for lovely talking fish. Feed them, play with them, and watch them interact with each other. Hey, your finned friends are waiting for you, so dive in now and enjoy this amazing underwater adventure!
 
Features:
● Unique gameplay: swap and match pieces, design and decorate aquariums, play with and take care of fish—all in one puzzle game!
● Play hundreds of challenging and fun match-3 levels
● Compete with other players to develop your aquarium even faster
● Explore an exciting aquatic world with funny talking 3D fish that each have their own personality
● Liven up fish tanks with breathtaking underwater decor
● Grab your scuba mask and enjoy amazing aquarium graphics
● It’s a blast for everyone: share your Fishdom mania with your Facebook friends!
● No Wi-Fi or internet connection required to play
 
Please note that Fishdom is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.
 
Enjoying Fishdom? Learn more: Facebook: facebook.com/Fishdom Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fishdom_mobile/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/FishdomOfficial
 
Questions? Contact our tech support at fishdom@playrix.com
playstore_details.summary: Swap and match to create lovely homes for adorable fish!
playstore_details.summaryHTML: Swap and match to create lovely homes for adorable fish!
playstore_details.developerAddress: 4th floor, Red Oak North, South County Business Park, Leopardstown, Dublin 18 D18 X5K7, Ireland
playstore_details.recentChanges:
VALENTINE'S DAY
- Decorate the new holiday aquarium to watch a movie and earn some boosters
- Get the cute Love Spirit fish in the Valentine's Day event
- Earn valentines to buy new decorations in the Romantic Fever event

THE AQUARIST CLUB
- Earn tokens to help the new characters restore the Aquarist Club
- Complete all the tasks to keep the restored room

ALSO FEATURING
- The Italy Holiday aquarium and 17 new decorations
- 1 new fish
